welcome.description: Welcome to Johor's one-stop platform for all your ticketing needs. Easily browse, select, and purchase tickets for state-managed venues, cultural sites, recreational facilities, and state-organized events across Johor. Our secure platform ensures a seamless booking experience for residents and visitors alike.
welcome.collapsible.infoParagraph1: This platform provides access to tickets for all state-managed facilities including recreational parks, museums, cultural sites, and special events. Users can easily browse available dates, select various ticket types, and complete secure transactions online.
welcome.collapsible.infoParagraph2: Additional features include digital ticket delivery, QR code entry passes, member accounts with order history, and preferential rates for residents, students, and senior citizens. For large groups or special access needs, please contact the respective venues directly via the information provided on their detail pages.
ticketDisplay.heading: Available Tickets & Attractions
ticketDisplay.subheading: Explore our latest offers and popular attractions.
